pages.title: Home
pages.description: Illinois MakerLab homepage featuring quick links to services, latest blog posts, and customer reviews of our 3D printing services.

pages.title: About Us
pages.description: Learn about Illinois MakerLab - the world's first business school 3D printing lab, our mission, history since 2012, and impact at UIUC.

pages.title: Lab Staff
pages.description: Meet the MakerLab team including our director, design gurus, and student staff who help with 3D printing and digital making.

pages.title: Partners
pages.description: Organizations and companies that partner with Illinois MakerLab for 3D printing services, research, and educational initiatives.

pages.title: FAQ
pages.description: Frequently asked questions about 3D printing at MakerLab: hours, pricing, materials, print sizes, software recommendations, and services.

pages.title: Services & Pricing
pages.description: Complete pricing guide for MakerLab 3D printing services. Rates for students, faculty, staff, and community members. Design assistance pricing included.

pages.title: Online Ordering
pages.description: Submit your 3D printing order online. Upload STL files, select materials, and pick up at MakerLab. Convenient ordering for UIUC community.

pages.title: Summer Camps
pages.description: Week-long summer camps for youth ages 9-17. Minecraft + 3D Printing, Adventures in 3D Modeling, and Generative AI + 3D Printing camps available.

pages.title: Birthday Parties
pages.description: Host a 3D printing-themed birthday party at MakerLab. Kids learn to design and create their own 3D printed keepsake.

pages.title: Workshops
pages.description: 3D printing and digital making workshops offered at MakerLab. Learn Fusion 360, 3D scanning, and maker skills.

pages.title: Courses
pages.description: Academic courses offered through MakerLab at UIUC. Making Things (BADM 331) covers 3D printing, prototyping, and digital fabrication.

pages.title: Making Things Course
pages.description: BADM 331 Making Things course details. Hands-on exploration of 3D printing, prototyping, and digital fabrication. Offered every Spring.

pages.title: Resources
pages.description: Learning resources for 3D printing and digital making. Software downloads, tutorials, and helpful links for makers.

pages.title: Lab Hours
pages.description: Current MakerLab operating hours. Hours vary by semester - check this page for the latest schedule and special closures.

pages.title: Contact
pages.description: Contact Illinois MakerLab. Email uimakerlab@illinois.edu or visit BIF Room 3030 at UIUC. Includes contact form and directions.

pages.title: Blog
pages.description: MakerLab blog with 291+ posts since 2012. Project highlights, maker stories, lab news, and 3D printing inspiration.

pages.title: Gallery
pages.description: Photo gallery of 3D printed projects, maker creations, and MakerLab events. See what's possible with digital fabrication.

pages.title: Free Print Wednesdays
pages.description: Get 1 hour of free 3D printing every Wednesday during Fall and Spring semesters. Learn about this popular MakerLab program.

pages.title: Private Events
pages.description: Book MakerLab for private events, team building activities, corporate workshops, and custom group experiences.

pages.title: Volunteer
pages.description: Volunteer opportunities at Illinois MakerLab. Help with events, assist visitors, and gain experience in the maker space.

pages.title: Waiver Forms
pages.description: Required waiver and consent forms for MakerLab activities, summer camps, and birthday parties.

pages.title: Give to MakerLab
pages.description: Support Illinois MakerLab through donations. Help fund equipment, scholarships, and maker education programs.

pages.title: Past Gurus
pages.description: Alumni of the MakerLab Guru program - former student staff who helped build our maker community.

pages.title: Practicum
pages.description: Information about the MakerLab practicum program for students interested in hands-on maker education experience.

pages.title: Summer Jobs
pages.description: Summer employment opportunities at MakerLab. Work as a camp counselor or lab assistant.

pages.title: Scholarships
pages.description: Scholarship opportunities for MakerLab summer camps and programs. Financial assistance for maker education.

pages.title: Online Courses
pages.description: Online learning resources and courses related to 3D printing and digital making.

pages.title: MakerLab x Makers4COVID19
pages.description: How MakerLab partnered with Makers4COVID19 to produce PPE and support the community during the pandemic.

pages.title: 2020 Wrapped
pages.description: MakerLab year in review for 2020. Highlights, achievements, and community impact during a challenging year.

pages.title: HackIllinois
pages.description: MakerLab's involvement with HackIllinois, UIUC's premier hackathon. 3D printing support for hackers.

pages.title: 3D Printing Conference
pages.description: Information about 3D printing conferences and events MakerLab participates in or hosts.

pages.title: Internship Database
pages.description: Database of internship opportunities in maker spaces, 3D printing companies, and digital fabrication.

archived.title: Digital Making Course
archived.description: BADM 357 Digital Making course (discontinued - last offered Spring 2019)

archived.title: Online Summer Camps 2021
archived.description: Virtual summer camps offered during COVID-19 (historical)

archived.title: Summer 2020 Response
archived.description: MakerLab's response to COVID-19 for summer 2020 (historical)
